Package engine.forBoard

Class BoardOperations

java.lang.Object
engine.forBoard.BoardUtils
public class BoardOperations extends Object
The BoardOperations class performs various operations related to the chess board.

The BoardOperations class provides methods for checking valid tile coordinates and converting between positions and coordinates. It also includes constants for file names, rank names, and other board-related values. This class cannot be instantiated.
Author:
Aaron Ho
